title: Chests not showing
body:
Hey guys, so this is happening to me
Here it says that i got 4 chests available https://i.gyazo.com/49c4b274471d4fc3b2f77654f9ce4472.png

Buuuut in my loot shows nothing https://i.gyazo.com/4ce7fd909a153f5ec5095cd885f32b26.png

Maybe it changed (stopped playing for like 4-5 months) 
Hope you can help me out :)

replies.body: Those are 4 chests available to be earned, you or a teammate need to get an s in order for you to earn that chest and use one of your keys on it.

What TW2Meow said. Those are chests that are *available*, meaning you haven't acquired them yet. Check out the Mastery FAQ for all the different ways to get [**hextech chests**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233) if you're unsure.
